set_dns_google: settings put global private_dns_mode hostname && settings put global private_dns_specifier dns.google
set_dns_cloudflare: settings put global private_dns_mode hostname && settings put global private_dns_specifier 1dot1dot1dot1.cloudflare-dns.com
animation_speed_fast: settings put global window_animation_scale 0.5 && settings put global transition_animation_scale 0.5 && settings put global animator_duration_scale 0.5
power_mode_performance: cmd power set-fixed-performance-mode-enabled true && cmd power set-adaptive-power-saver-enabled false
fps_unlocker_on: settings put system peak_refresh_rate 999 && settings put system min_refresh_rate 999
force_gpu_rendering: setprop debug.hwui.force_hw_ui true && settings put global disable_hw_overlays 1
force_angle_for_app: settings put global angle_gl_driver_selection_pkgs {packageName} && settings put global angle_gl_driver_selection_values angle
